1: (3:19)[a] “For indeed the day[b] is coming, burning like a furnace, and all the arrogant evildoers will be chaff. The coming day will burn them up,” says the Lord of Heaven's Armies. “It[c] will not leave them even a root or branch.
2: But for you who respect my name, the sun of vindication[d] will rise with healing wings,[e] and you will skip about[f] like calves released from the stall.
3: You will trample on the wicked, for they will be like ashes under the soles of your feet on the day that I am preparing,” says the Lord of Heaven's Armies.
4: “Remember the law of my servant Moses, to whom at Horeb[g] I gave rules and regulations for all Israel to obey.[h]
5: Look, I will send you Elijah[i] the prophet before the great and terrible day of the Lord arrives.
6: He will encourage fathers and their children to return to me,[j] so that I will not come and strike the earth with judgment.”[k]
